snippet: Souvenirs of service aboard the Intrepid; Käthe Kollwitz’s disparate portfolio; African headrests.
abstract: Eve M Kahn Antiques column; Intrepid Sea, Air & Space Museum is planning exhibitions and searchable databases for hundreds of artifacts that have been donated in honor of carrier's 70th anniversary; German artist Kathe Kollwitz’s disparate portfolio are on view at Galerie St Etienne in Manhattan; Evan M Maurer consigns many of his holdings from collection of African headrests for Bonhams sale in New York.
lead_paragraph: Souvenirs of service aboard the Intrepid; Käthe Kollwitz’s disparate portfolio; African headrests.

headline.print_headline:
Call of Duty, Revisited:
Artifacts of the Intrepid
